content.c_venueAddress: Charing Cross Rd, Charing Cross, London WC2H 0DA
content.name: Long Day’s Journey Into Night

primaryPhoto.description:
Often regarded as the greatest American play of the 20th Century, this landmark new production of LONG DAY’S JOURNEY INTO NIGHT, helmed by award-winning director Jeremy Herrin, will be coming to London’s Wyndham’s Theatre in 2024.
Emmy and Golden Globe award-winning actors Brian Cox (Succession) and Patricia Clarkson (Sharp Objects) make their return to the London stage in Eugene O’Neill’s LONG DAY’S JOURNEY INTO NIGHT. Laurie Kynaston (Fool Me Once) joins the cast in the role of Edmund Tyrone.
Following his recent acclaimed production of Best of Enemies, Jeremy Herrin’s new production will bring into sharp focus the universality of Eugene O’Neill’s beautifully crafted characters and language, to create an unmissable theatrical event.
Book your LONG DAY’S JOURNEY INTO NIGHT theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
